coding_practice.title: Delete Operation for Two Strings
coding_practice.description:
Given two strings word1 and word2, return the minimum number of steps required to make word1 and word2 the same.

In one step, you can delete exactly one character in either string.

examples.explanation: You need one step to make "sea" to "ea" and another step to make "eat" to "ea".

coding_practice.constraints:
1 <= word1.length, word2.length <= 500
word1 and word2 consist of only lowercase English letters.
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 使用 dp[i][j] 表示將 word1[0..i-1] 與 word2[0..j-1] 匹配所需的最小刪除次數。
2. 初始化 dp[i][0] = i, dp[0][j] = j，因為其中一個字符串為空時，需刪除另一個字符串的全部字符。
3. 遍歷 i, j，如果 word1[i-1] == word2[j-1]，則 dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j-1]。
4. 否則 dp[i][j] = min(dp[i-1][j], dp[i][j-1]) + 1。
5. 最終返回 dp[m][n]。
